alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 7:33PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Toombs, southeastern Wheeler and southern Montgomery Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Ohoopee to near Jordan, and moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Lyons, Vidalia, Uvalda, Santa Claus, Alston, Center, Toombs Central, Ohoopee, New Branch, Ponderosa, McNatt Falls, South Thompson, English Eddy, Grays Landing, Rock Springs, Cedar Crossing, Johnson Corner, Jordan, and Charlotteville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
